name: Salty Pelican - Lagoon Blue
description:
Printed on a garment dyed, long sleeve tee from Comfort Colors. Designed and printed in the South using super-soft, water-based ink. 

Also available in Violet, Watermelon, Grey, and more. Small - XL.

**Garment dyed shirt care - Wash inside out, separately, in cold water before wearing. Avoid stain removers as spotting can occur. Variation in color or fading is normal, making each shirt unique.

name: Peli Tank - Neon Red Orange
description:
It's tank top time. Get yours and head to the shore. 

Garment dyed, tank top from Comfort Colors. Printed with eco-friendlier, water-based ink, which makes for a super soft, worn-in feel. 

Available in Chalky Mint, Neon Pink, and Neon Red Orange.

**Garment dyed shirt care - Wash inside out, separately, in cold water before wearing. Avoid stain removers as spotting can occur. Variation in color or fading is normal, making each shirt unique.

description: Beach bum approved to look cool on your truck, car, SUV, boat, or any other mode of transportation. Stick it on a YETI if that's how you roll, or dress up the trusty Igloo.

name: Best of the Southern Coast
description:
Southern Coast favorites from North Carolina to Texas. Chances are, you'll find a new spot to explore. Now I'm ready for a road trip. 

SS Logo flag printed on the front pocket. Southern Coast favorites listed on the back. Short-sleeve pocket tee from Comfort Colors. 100% preshrunk, ringspun cotton. 

Available in White. Sizes S-2X.

name: SS Flag - Watermelon
description:
Wave your flag. Southern Coast represent. 

Salty Sea logo flag printed on a garment dyed, short-sleeved, pocket tee from Comfort Colors. Front pocket print only. Designed and printed in the South using eco-friendly, water-based inks. 

Available in Watermelon and Ice Blue. Sizes S-XL. 

**Garment dyed shirt care - Wash separately in cold water before wearing. Avoid using stain removers as spotting can occur. Variations in color and/or fading is considered normal, making each shirt unique.

name: SS Flag - Ice Blue
description:

**Garment dyed shirt care - Wash separately in cold water before wearing. Avoid using stain removers as spotting can occur. Variations in color and/or fading is considered normal, making each shirt unique.

name: SS Palm Tree tee - Blue Jean
description:
Palm trees thrive near salty air and water. I can relate.

Salty Sea palm tree printed on a garment dyed, short-sleeve pocket tee by Comfort Colors. Designed and printed in the South using eco-friendly, water-based inks. 

Available in White, Blue Jean (Navy), and Light Green. 

Sizes S-2X.
